board.name: admpa120_vp1202_2ms

image.name: admpa120_image.jpg
image.description: ADM-PA120 PCI Express Reconfigurable Computing Card"

board.description: ADM-PA120 PCI Express Reconfigurable Computing Card (XCVP1202-2MS, Board Rev. 3+)

component.name: part0
component.description: The XCVP1202 ASoC.

component.name: ps_pmc_fixed_io
component.description: Versal CIPS component

component.name: lpddr4_b0
component.description: LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 0 (4 GB) @ LPDDR4-3733, 2x32 bits wide.

component.name: lpddr4_b1
component.description: LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 1 (4 GB) @ LPDDR4-3733, 2x32 bits wide.

component.name: lpddr4_b2
component.description: LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 2 (4 GB) @ LPDDR4-3733, 2x32 bits wide.

component.name: lpddr4_b3
component.description: LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 3 (4 GB) @ LPDDR4-3200, 2x32 bits wide.

component.name: lpddr4_b0_sys_clk
component.description: Clock generator used as LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 0 controller system clock (factory default 300 MHz).

component.name: lpddr4_b1_sys_clk
component.description: Clock generator used as LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 1 controller system clock (factory default 300 MHz).

component.name: lpddr4_b2_sys_clk
component.description: Clock generator used as LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 2 controller system clock (factory default 300 MHz).

component.name: lpddr4_b3_sys_clk
component.description: Clock generator used as LPDDR4 SDRAM bank 3 controller system clock (factory default 300 MHz).

component.name: fabric_clk
component.display_name: General purpose 100 MHz clock for PL
component.description: Fixed-frequency 100 MHz clock for PL.

component.name: pcie_refclk_0
component.description: GT Quad 102 reference clock 0 that is a copy of the PCIe reference clock from the PCIe edge connector. The nominal frequency of this clock is 100 MHz but is determined by the PCIe motherboard.

component.name: pcie_refclk_1
component.description: GT Quad 104 reference clock 0 that is a copy of the PCIe reference clock from the PCIe edge connector. The nominal frequency of this clock is 100 MHz but is determined by the PCIe motherboard.

component.name: pcie_lcl_refclk
component.description: GT Quad 103 reference clock 0 that is generated locally on the board by a fixed-frequency 100 MHz oscillator. It can be used as a PCIe reference clock in cases where the motherboard does not provide a suitable PCIe reference clock.

component.name: mgt_progclk_0
component.description: Programmable clock generator output 0 (factory default 161.1328125 MHz) to GT Quad 204 REFCLK0.

component.name: mgt_progclk_1
component.description: Programmable clock generator output 1 (factory default 161.1328125 MHz) to GT Quad 203 REFCLK0.

component.name: mgt_progclk_2
component.description: Programmable clock generator output 2 (factory default 161.1328125 MHz) to GT Quad 200 REFCLK0.

component.name: si5344_out0
component.description: Programmable SI5344C jitter attenuator output 0 to GT Quad 205 REFCLK0.

component.name: si5344_out1
component.description: Programmable SI5344C jitter attenuator output 1 to GT Quad 202 REFCLK0.

component.name: si5344_out2
component.description: Programmable SI5344C jitter attenuator output 2 to GT Quad 201 REFCLK0.

component.name: si5402_out1
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 1 to GT Quad 200 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_out2
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 2 to GT Quad 201 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_out3
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 3 to GT Quad 202 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_out4
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 4 to GT Quad 203 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_out5
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 5 to PL.

component.name: si5402_out6
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 9 to GT Quad 204 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_out7
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator output 10 to GT Quad 205 REFCLK1.

component.name: si5402_in0
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator input 0.

component.name: si5402_in1
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator input 1.

component.name: si5402_in2
component.description: Programmable SI5402B jitter attenuator input 2.

component.name: itu_10mhz
component.description: 10 MHz clock input to PL, as per ITU-T G.703 section 20.

component.name: qsfp0_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) for managing QSFP0 module.

component.name: qsfp1_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) for managing QSFP1 module.

component.name: qsfp2_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) for managing QSFP2 module.

component.name: si5344_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) for managing SI5344C jitter attenuator.

component.name: si5402_i2c
component.description: Interface (I2C) for managing SI5402B jitter attenuator.

component.name: user_led
component.description: User-defined LEDs: [5:0] = { user_led_g5_l, ..., user_led_g0_l }.

component.name: pmod_io
component.description: GPIO signals on 0.1" Digilent Pmod right-angle socket: [7:0] = { pmod_io8, ..., pmod_io1 }.

component.name: user_switch
component.description: User-defined switches: [1:0] = { usr_sw_1, usr_sw_0 }.

component.name: spare_wp
component.display_name: Write protect for user-definable I2C EEPROM
component.description: [0:0] = { spare_wp }.

component.name: board_monitoring
component.description: Board status signals: [0:0] = { srvc_md_l }.

component.name: si5344_mgmt_in
component.description: SI5344 management input signals: [2:0] = { si5344_lol_xaxb_n, si5344_lol_n, si5344_intr_n }.

component.name: si5344_mgmt_out
component.description: SI5344 management output signals: [0:0] = { si5344_rst_n }.

component.name: si5402_mgmt_out
component.description: SI5402 management output signals: [0] = { si5402_rst_n }.

component.name: si5402_gpio
component.description: SI5402B GPIO signals: [0] = { si5402_gpio2, si5402_gpio1, si5402_gpio0 }.

component.name: qsfp0_mgmt_out
component.description: QSFP0 management output signals: [1:0] = { qsfp0_lpmode, qsfp0_reset_l }.

component.name: qsfp1_mgmt_out
component.description: QSFP1 management output signals: [1:0] = { qsfp1_lpmode, qsfp1_reset_l }.

component.name: qsfp2_mgmt_out
component.description: QSFP2 management output signals: [1:0] = { qsfp2_lpmode, qsfp2_reset_l }.
